Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt and Halsted: near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Roosevelt, Halsted and over regular route, due to a parade near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak buses Temporary Westbound Reroute near 54th Pink Line

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/major delays following earlier fire department activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
